title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about money or banknotes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about money or banknotes in a dream: Some consider seeing money in a dream a sign of happiness and achieving wonderful profits, while others consider money as an anguish from God and a difficult test that is difficult to achieve. The nature and vision of this dream has several indications that we will explain in detail. Interpretation of a dream about money or banknotes in a dream. The interpretation of seeing banknotes indicates many indications, including what is good and what is bad, as the vision is characterized by flexibility that makes it transferable to more than one person. The vision symbolizes abundant profit in reality and the abundance of work from which the viewer derives many material and moral benefits represented by experiences and skills that qualify him to participate in trials and battles without the need for anything else. The vision indicates alleviation of distress, the disappearance of distress and sadness, and the improvement of the family’s financial conditions. And entering into new projects, and enjoying great awareness and saving to ward off any danger that may occur in the future. The vision symbolizes saving money to secure daily needs and achieving a state of satiety and internal sufficiency on the one hand, and securing tomorrow from any disasters or crises that may occur. The interpretation of a dream about money and paper has a meaning that symbolizes To the prestige, power and prestige that awaits the fortuneteller in the near future. The vision also shows a gradual improvement that does not happen overnight but rather requires effort, precious and valuable work and hard work. It is said that it is evil to see money or money because seeing it symbolizes the tribulation in which God puts His servants to the test. The extent of their sincerity, faith, and sincerity. The dreamer may believe that he is close to God and obeys His commandments and obeys Him well, but he may resort to it because he is well off and has not yet been placed in the position from which he can judge whether he is sincere. Or false. Therefore, seeing money is a test to know what he will do with it, how he will use it, and whether he will remain in his covenant with God, or will money change his personality and morals and corrupt his religion. And if he sees in a dream that he found money in the street, this indicates fleeting crises that do not last long with the fortuneteller. Hence, the vision was a warning to prepare for any urgent event. And if he sees that he is selling money, this is a sign of the sale from which he hopes to buy what is safe. Seeing money indicates the illusion that a person clings to and struggles throughout his life, and in the end he will not get it. Something. It also indicates the mirage that a person follows eagerly and passionately, and the closer he gets to it, the further he strays from the path of truth and strays in this world. The dream also symbolizes the burdens and concerns that burden the dreamer, and the responsibility that he cannot bear alone. Many interpreters believe that Seeing money or money is bad, because money symbolizes the world, its desires and pleasures, and attachment to it means the end of the relationship that existed between the dreamer and his Lord. Some distinguish paper money from metal, saying that metal symbolizes simplicity, that is, the problems and light sorrows that the dreamer overcomes with The passage of time. As for paper money, it means anything

Seeing money indicates the illusion that a person clings to and struggles with throughout his life, and in the end he will not get anything from it. It also indicates the mirage that a person follows with passion and passion, and the closer he gets to it, the further he gets from the path of truth and goes astray in this world. The dream also symbolizes the burdens and worries that weigh on the dreamer, and the responsibility that he cannot bear alone. Some distinguish paper money from metal, saying that Metal symbolizes simplicity, that is, the problems and light sorrows that the dreamer overcomes with time. As for paper money, it means anything.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of drinking milk in a dream

preview.html: The most important interpretations of seeing yourself drinking milk in a dream The interpretation of seeing yourself drinking milk in a dream contains much evidence, because the dreamer sees that he is drinking the milk of a goat or a camel, and he can see that he is drinking the milk of wolves and other unusual animals whose milk he actually drinks, and because it is a symbol of milk. It is one of the symbols full of meanings and we have explained its many interpretations in the following paragraphs. Drinking milk in a dreamIf the fortuneteller eats horse milk and it tastes delicious, then he is loved by a person with great power and status, and he will be one of his closest relatives in the future. If a strange animal is seen in a dream And the dreamer drinks his milk, then this is a good and new beginning that the dreamer will enjoy in his life as follows: Or not: And whoever suffers from a disease that has no cure in reality and sees this dream, God will grant him success quickly and those around him may be affected by the fact that he survived a disease that doctors could not cure. Secondly: :If the dreamer was previously imprisoned, and he saw that he was drinking the milk of an unknown animal and his appearance was terrifying like a monster, then he should be released and released from prison in the next few days. Third: If intractable fears increased in the dreamer’s life, and he dreamed of this scene, because the events he experienced in The past, pain and suffering that he suffered will not be repeated again, and he will be surprised by the solution of his crises and their complete disappearance from his life, and the happiness that he experiences will be by God’s grace upon him. If he dreams of drinking bird’s milk, he will receive a small amount of money, but drinking the milk of cows, goats, etc. From animals whose milk he drinks while waking up means money that the dreamer worked hard to obtain, and therefore it is. It is permissible and blessed. Drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Seeing milk is money, and depending on its purity or its fullness of impurities, a detailed interpretation of the vision is known as follows: Or not: If the milk is pure and the dreamer drinks a lot of it, he will live with lawful money in his life and will soon move to A financial level higher than his current level. Second: If the dreamer drinks a little milk, then his money will not meet his needs, and he will suffer from debt and poverty, and if the milk is sour or spoiled, his financial and professional life will be ruined and ruined. If the dreamer is on a trip and drinks a lot of Milk during his sleep, then he will achieve his purpose for this journey. If the dreamer’s job is in agriculture and he sees that in a dream he drinks delicious, creamy milk, this indicates an increase in the crops of his land and an expansion of his livelihood due to the sale of many of his crops. Drinking milk in a dream for a single womanWhen the girl saw in her dream a lot She drank a lot of cups of milk until she felt satisfied. This is a marriage for her, and during her marriage a large number of attendees will come to celebrate this occasion with her. If the fortuneteller drinks milk in her dream while she is sad because of the bad circumstances that happened to her and which led to her separation from her lover, then this sadness will disappear with the arrival of a young man. New in her life is the one who will do this. Correct everything, what spoiled the ex and give her the affection that she lacked before. Drinking pulp

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something according to Ibn Sirin and the great scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something causes confusion and anxiety for people because they feel worried about their loved ones and fear that they will not be in a good situation. In the following article, we will present to you the most famous interpretations of scholars on this topic, so let us read the following. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking something from the living and indicates that he has not done enough good in his life, which makes him in dire need of someone to pray for him. It reminds him of goodness in his prayers. If a person dreams of a dead person asking him for clothes, this is a sign of the painful torture he is going through and his desire to be saved as quickly as possible. If the dreamer sees the deceased in his sleep asking him for something that he does not understand, this indicates that he is doing things Many things do not benefit him at all. Seeing in a dream a deceased person asking him about an unresolved matter symbolizes wasting many years of his life practicing evil and immorality, and his end will be very bad if he does not stop these actions immediately. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking something from his son Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of the deceased in a dream asking him for something as a sign that he is suffering from severe torment at that time and hopes that his family and acquaintances will remember him well in their prayers. If a person sees in his dream that the deceased is asking him for something, this symbolizes the pain he is suffering from in his life The coming and his intense desire for someone to comfort him from what he is going through. If the dreamer sees during his sleep the dead person asking him for something while he is still alive, this indicates that he will be blessed with many good deeds in his next life because of his many good deeds in this world. The dreamer’s vision In a dream with a deceased person asking him for something is a sign that he should be careful about his life at that time, as he may commit many wrong actions that will lead to his death. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking something for a free man: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream asking something from this person The deceased, means that there are many changes that will occur in her life in the coming days and they will be very promising for her. If the dreamer sees her dead father asking her for something in her dream, this is a sign that she is starting to give up on her life goals and he appears to her to encourage her to continue the journey. If he sees The dreamer sees a dead person in his dream asking something about her with great anger, this means that she is performing many shameful actions that will lead to her death if she does not stop them immediately. For a woman to see in her dream a dead person asking her for something and she agreed to it, this symbolizes her well-known characteristics that make others love her Often. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something for a married woman. A married woman’s dream in a dream about a deceased asking her about something valuable is evidence that she has lost something very dear to her heart and as a result she will enter a state of extreme sadness. Seeing a dead person in her dream asking one of her children is an indication that she She will suffer from a very serious illness, which will make her go through a lot of pain and she will be very sad to see him in this condition. If a woman sees a solution

title: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman wearing a wedding dress

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a divorced woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream. Seeing a wedding dress has many meanings, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream can be A sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows best, as it may indicate marriage, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees a divorced woman wearing a tight, bare wedding dress, this may lead to unpleasant things, and God knows best. When she sees a divorced woman wearing a wedding dress, this may be a sign of appreciation and marriage to a good man. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman praying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman praying in a dream could be a sign of goodness and living, God willing. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman praying in a dream, this may be evidence of the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a man sees his ex-wife praying in a dream In a dream, this may be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. When a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is praying the turn, it may be a sign of satisfaction from God Almighty, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream could be a sign of liberation from Trouble, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a divorced woman reading the Qur’an expresses a good situation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman reading the Qur’an, it may express the solution of problems with her husband, and God knows best. Also, seeing a divorced woman reading the Qur’an may mean getting rid of worry and sadness, and God knows best. Knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream calling a divorced woman in a dream could indicate getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman praying in a dream, this may indicate goodness, God willing. When a divorced woman sees herself praying in a dream, This may be a sign of weakness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, while absolute supplication may indicate that the situation has changed for the better, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams of a divorced woman hitting her husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman hitting her husband in a dream may be an indication of the benefits she gets from him, and God knows best. If she sees A divorced woman’s ex-husband hits her in a dream. This may be evidence of the benefits she gains from him, and God knows the unseen. When she sees the absolute blow, it could be a sign of benefits and interests, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of a dream could be about a divorced woman committing adultery. Adultery in a dream is a sign of a woman being warned by an evil man, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a divorced woman committing adultery may indicate the pressure she is suffering from, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees adultery, it may lead to the loss of money, and God knows the unseen. Also, absolute adultery can portend a warning. From committing sins and disobedience, and God is Most High. Interpretation of a dream about my divorced friend’s engagement in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about a spacious grave

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wide grave: Interpretation of a dream about a wide grave may bring with it some fear accompanied by a little tension, due to the widespread belief among many that the interpretation of a dream about a wide grave carries within it evil for the dreamer, but the truth is that the dream interpretation of a wide grave. A large, wide dream can bring positive news and sometimes negative news. We will tell you the interpretation of a dream about a wide grave. Interpretation of a dream about a wide grave by Ibn Shaheen. The interpretation of seeing a wide grave in a dream is evidence of a person’s repentance for the sins and disobedience that he commits. The interpretation of seeing a wide grave in a dream and feeling fear and panic is evidence of That the dreamer will fall into trouble and a difficult situation, but he will receive God’s protection. The interpretation of seeing a wide grave in a dream and the person who sees him walking on it has connotations. Or if the dreamer is a young, unmarried man, then this is a sign of urgency and getting married soon. The interpretation of seeing one of your friends in A spacious grave is a sign that your friend will cause you to fall into crises, misfortunes, and material losses. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s wide grave. Interpretation of a dreamer who digs his grave is an indication of establishing a new home or that he is on the verge of the new life he desires. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of digging a grave Evidence that her life is full of worries and marital problems that may lead to divorce. The interpretation of seeing the digging of a grave and cleaning it in a dream indicates the end of crises in his life and that the situation will change to start a new life. The interpretation of seeing the digging of a large number of graves in a dream is evidence of the presence of hypocrites and liars in the dreamer’s life. And that caution and caution should be exercised in dealing with them. Interpretation of a dream about a spacious grave for a married woman. Interpretation of the testimony of a married woman who visits a dead person in graves is evidence for that woman that she is facing great distress and anguish that may lead to her separation from her husband. Interpretation of seeing a girl digging a grave for her husband in a dream is a sign of Marital problems and that the husband will divorce her or leave her. The interpretation of seeing a wife digging a grave for her husband and then burying him in it is evidence that this woman will never give birth to this person. The interpretation of watching a married woman crying on a grave in a low voice is evidence of sustenance and enormous wealth. It is also an indication of relief from anxiety and a way out of the problems and crises that the viewer is going through. Interpretation of a dream about a spacious grave in a dream about a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman filling a grave in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will achieve great success and broad ambition in her life. The interpretation of seeing the shape and form of the grave in a dream indicates that she will give birth easily and that she will give birth to a healthy child. The interpretation of seeing the grave at home The interpretation of the testimony that prayer is present in the home for an unmarried young man is evidence that this young man is unhappy in his life and feels lonely and that he does not enjoy peace in life and this It will affect his life in the coming days.Interpretation of seeing a married man who was surprised in his dream that there was a grave in his house, evidence of the death of a family member in that house.Interpretation of seeing sleeping or sitting next to a grave in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the dreamer sleeping or

The interpretation of seeing the grave at home The interpretation of the testimony that prayer is present in the home for an unmarried young man is evidence that this young man is unhappy in his life and feels lonely and that he does not enjoy peace in life and this It will affect his life in the coming days.Interpretation of seeing a married man who was surprised in his dream that there was a grave in his house, evidence of the death of a family member in that house.Interpretation of seeing sleeping or sitting next to a grave in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the dreamer sleeping or

Her intense desire to make a positive change in her life, and her complete dissatisfaction with her life. Whereas if an unmarried woman dyes her hair black in a dream. This is an indication of the troubles and troubles that she will face in the near future. Her hesitation and inability to make decisions easily. Dyeing the hair of a single girl black Red indicates the approaching date of marriage, God willing. This is an indication of her strong desire for radical change and her efforts to do so. title: Interpretation of seeing a bride without a groom in a dream. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Follow usInterpretation of seeing a bride without a groom in a dreamWedding ceremonies are considered one of the happy things that many girls and men look forward to, despite the fact that if they come in a dream, they can have bad connotations such as sadness or death, and they can also mean joy. We will also learn about the interpretation of marriage in a dream for a married woman in detail in cases of good and evil, as a married woman wakes up from her slumber, searching for interpretations that re-see the husband or the husband's marriage. A woman with her husband, the dream is one of the happy visions that every woman wishes for, as joy and concepts of happiness attract in the hearts, and they are the moments that are followed by successive stations that combine comfort and the difficulties of life, but what if she is married, is seeing marriage a dream worthy of praise or not? This is what we reveal through our encyclopedia article, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a bride without a groom in a dream Many of those who see any dream in their dreams seek to interpret this dream from interpreters, and there is no doubt that seeing a bride without a groom in a dream occupies the mind of the viewer and makes him wonder about the interpretation of this vision. So today we come to you with an interpretation of this dream and we will present it to you through the following lines. Seeing the bride without a groom on the wedding night means that the dreamer will make fateful decisions in her life and may indicate a feeling of confusion about certain matters. Seeing the bride without the groom in a dream means marrying the wrong person. Interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream for a married woman Many dream interpretation scholars have interpreted seeing a wedding in a dream for a married woman with many interpretations. Seeing a wedding in a dream carries a set of meanings and symbols that we study in our article. A married woman seeing a bride without a groom indicates the arrival of a lot of goodness and living for her, and this vision is considered a promising vision, especially if she feels happy in the dream. If a married woman sees herself in her dream sitting at a wedding without her husband, this indicates that there will be some changes in the financial situation for the better. One of the most promising visions is for a married woman to see herself as a bride without a groom, because it is good news that she will soon become pregnant. If a married woman sees herself wearing a wedding dress and sitting without her husband, this is a sign that there are some responsibilities that fall on her shoulders and bother her, and some see this vision as an unpleasant vision. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Here, my dear, are all the interpretations indicated by the scholar Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of dreams, as they are among the visions that have been questioned recently in their meanings and symbols. Seeing weddings in a dream is one of the visions that do not bode well, as it symbolizes the transition from one state to another or exposure to a health problem, as well as material losses, in addition to This vision is a sign of rebellion. And an indication of the successive crises that accompany the individual's path in reality. Seeing sitting happily without the groom in a dream for a married woman indicates: the material losses that she suffers

title: Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing plums in a dream has many interpretations, each of which differs according to the viewer, whether he is a man or a woman, and the interpretation differs for a pregnant woman, a married woman, and an unmarried girl. When you see plums in a dream, it has its own interpretation. Interpretation of seeing plums by Ibn Sirin. Plums in a dream are a sign of wealth and good luck that the dreamer will receive. Seeing plums in a dream outside the season means that you have fallen into many troubles and misfortunes. Seeing a plum tree indicates The benefits that the dreamer obtains. Red plums are a sign of success and excellence in personal and professional life. Whoever sees plums in a dream and this vision was during the plum season, he will enjoy good health. Whoever dreams that he is picking plums, this is an indication of the successes that he will achieve. Eating red plums It is a sign of blessing and goodness. Inside the black plum in the dream it indicates the end of worries and problems. Plums in general in a dream indicate abundant livelihood and profit from trade. Interpretation of seeing plums by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi confirmed that plums in a dream indicate good health and abundance. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing plums indicates Getting rid of the worries and problems that accumulate in the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees himself eating plums in a dream, this indicates comfort and relief from distress. Green plums are a sign of happiness and peace of mind in which the fortuneteller finds himself. Yellow plums in a dream from seeing unloved, which indicates Trouble, illness and envy. Whoever dreams of eating sour and rotten plums, this is a sign that he will get into trouble. Choosing an immature plum indicates some wrong decisions made by the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing plums for a single womanWhen an unmarried woman sees plums in a dream, they are present in many areas , which indicates her imminent marriage. If you see plums in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates kindness and nourishment that she will receive. Interpretation of a dream about plums for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees plums in a dream, this indicates a painless birth. Plums in a dream of pregnancy are an indicator On the safety of the fetus. Plums in a pregnant woman’s dream are evidence of the presence of a male child. Interpretation of seeing plums for a married woman. If a married man sees plums in a dream, it is good news for her husband’s livelihood. If you see green plums in a dream, this means the happiness and security that the woman feels. Add the dream you would like Its interpretation is in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing murder in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing murder in a dream Murder is one of the atrocities in which a person ends his life, and it is divided into two types, one of which is intentional killing, and the other is accidental. Together, the most important things the interpreters said in the dream, so follow us. Seeing murder in a dream Commentators say that seeing the dreamer killing him in a dream portends a long life in life. If the dreamer sees the death of his father in a dream, this means that he will soon collect a lot of legitimate money. As for seeing the dreamer in a dream He kills a person and bleeds, this indicates that the killed person will get a lot of money because he was bleeding from him. If the dreamer sees in a dream killing a person without cutting off any part of him, this means that he will reap great benefits from the killed person in the coming period. If a pregnant woman sees shooting On her husband in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a baby girl. To see yourself being killed with a knife in the dreamer’s dream, this means great livelihood and many goods that he will obtain in the coming days. If a pregnant woman sees someone being killed with a knife and bloodshed in a dream, this symbolizes An easy and trouble-free birth. Seeing the dreamer killing an animal with a knife in a dream indicates the repayment of debts and the death of severe torment that he has been suffering for a long time. Seeing killing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dreamer killing himself indicates that he has committed many sins and must To repent to God. If the dreamer sees someone trying to kill him in a dream, this indicates the presence of many enemies and he must beware of them. As for seeing a fortuneteller beating someone to death in a dream, this symbolizes that she has made many reckless decisions in her life without thinking. The dreamer’s vision In a dream, killing more than once means that you are living in an atmosphere full of internal conflicts and the inability to get rid of them. Seeing killing repeatedly in a dream means that he is forced to do many things against his will without his consent. If the dreamer has enemies and sees them being killed in a dream, this is a sign of... That they have overcome him and cannot confront them. Seeing the dreamer succeeding in killing someone who is chasing him in a dream means that he will soon find a prestigious job. If the dreamer sees killing in a dream and finds it difficult to do so, it symbolizes many obstacles that will stand in the way of achieving a certain success. Interpretation A dream about the assassination of Nabulsi: Imam Nabulsi says that seeing murder in a dream means great success and material gains that one will obtain soon. If the dreamer sees himself in a dream killed by a familiar person, this indicates victory over enemies. As for the dreamer who sees the killing of a stranger in a dream, it symbolizes Indifference and neglect towards religion. Seeing a dreamer killing himself in a dream means repentance to God and renunciation of sins and disobedience. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she killed her father, this symbolizes a rich diet and many good things that will come to her in the coming days. Seeing murder in a dream Single Woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she is killing a man in a dream, this means that he will fall in love with her and marry her. In case

title: Interpretation of the dream of the letter Z Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Dream interpretation of the letter Z Al-Nabulsi, or it can be said that seeing a hand in a dream indicates many things and meanings that were interpreted by Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, one of the most famous Muslim scholars, being an Islamic preacher. We explain more details about the interpretation of dreams starting with the letter Z. Interpretation of seeing a hand in a dream Seeing a hand in a dream is interpreted as an indication of the dreamer’s strength and ability to defeat his enemy, and this vision has also been interpreted as indicating good deeds performed by the dreamer.Interpretation Seeing Nabulsi’s hand: If one sees in a dream that his arm is outstretched or fully extended, then Nabulsi interprets this as a sign of the generosity of the owner of the vision. Glory be to Him who is highest and most knowledgeable. As for the one who sees in his dream that his hand is pouring water, this indicates that he will obtain good money and a lot of food for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing an arm or hand missing in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that his hand is amputated or missing in the vision, Al-Nabulsi interpreted it as the loss of a brother or a close friend. In addition to that, the vision shows family problems and disputes as well, and the vision shows the loss of important things in the dreamer’s life. As for someone who sees in his dream that he is not holding hands, this indicates love and intense love for the dreamer. Interpretation of dreams is that someone wakes him up in a dream. If You dream that someone wakes you up, which means that you are on the right path in your social and professional life. Interpretation of seeing jaundice in dreams. Seeing jaundice in a dream indicates that the dreamer chose him wrongly and that his clothes are also inappropriate, and the vision indicates the dreamer’s poor choice of his partner or wife. Interpretation The correct appearance of Nablus: Whoever dreams that he has sworn a false oath in his dream, this indicates family quarrels in the house and the loss of money by the dreamer, and it also symbolizes the destruction of the house and a very great deception and deception that the dreamer is passing by. As for whoever sees in his dream that he has sworn a true oath, this indicates On safety, good deeds, kindness, and food that awaits insight. Interpretation of seeing rubies in a dream. Whoever sees rubies in a dream, this means receiving very happy news for the dreamer, and rubies symbolize beautiful women and special adornments made of rubies, which the dreamer can obtain whether he is male or female. Interpretation of an orphan in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is an orphan, this indicates that there is someone superior to him in one of the following matters: a woman, money, trade, or other things, or someone who sees in his dream that he is eating. The money of orphans and widows, this indicates that the dreamer will fall into misfortune and suffer crises in the coming period of his life. And here ends our report on the interpretation of dreams that begin with the letter Z, as there are many connotations and signs that symbolize these dreams, and the visionary must pay attention to them. Closely.

Interpretation of seeing the hand of Al-Nabulsi If a person sees in a dream that his arm is extended or fully extended, Al-Nabulsi interprets this as a sign of the generosity of the owner of the vision. Glory be to He who is higher and more knowledgeable. As for the one who sees in his dream that his hand is pouring water from him, this indicates that he will get good money and a lot of food for the owner of the vision. Interpretation of seeing a missing arm or hand in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that his hand is cut off or missing in the vision, Al-Nabulsi interpreted it as the loss of a brother or a friend who is very close to the dreamer, in addition to that the vision shows family problems and disputes as well, and the vision shows the loss of important things in the dreamer's life, but whoever sees in his dream that he does not have a hand in hand, this indicates love and intense love for the dreamer. Interpretation of dreams that someone wakes him up in a dream If you dream that someone wakes you up, this means that you are on the right path in your social and professional life. Interpretation of seeing jaundice in dreams Seeing jaundice in a dream indicates that the owner of the vision chose him wrongly and that his clothes are also inappropriate, and the vision indicates the dreamer's poor choice of his partner or wife. Interpretation of the correct appearance of Al-Nabulsi Whoever dreams that he swore a false oath in his dream, this indicates family quarrels at home and the owner of the vision's loss of money, and it also symbolizes the destruction of the home and a very great deception and deception The dreamer is passing, but whoever sees in his dream that he has sworn a sincere oath, indicates safety, good deeds, kindness and food that await the visionary. Interpretation of seeing a ruby ​​in a dream Whoever sees a ruby ​​in a dream, this means receiving very happy news for the dreamer, and the ruby ​​symbolizes a beautiful woman and a special ornament from the ruby, which the dreamer can obtain whether male or female. Interpretation of an orphan in a dream Whoever sees in his dream that he is an orphan, this indicates that there is someone who excels him in one of the following matters: a woman, money, trade, or other, or whoever sees in his dream that he is eating the money of orphans and widows, this indicates that the dreamer will fall into hatred and suffer crises in the coming period of his life. Here ends our report on the interpretation of dreams that begin with the letter Z, as there are many indications and signs that symbolize these dreams, and the visionary must pay close attention to them.
